entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Gagetown 08:35 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this morning then to rain at times heavy later this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
